content.rendered:
Estimated reading time: 5 minutes

In this article, you will explore the list of the most handsome men in Bangladesh in 2021. With a population of around 163 million, Bangladesh produces some charming and good looking men every year. The sports, entertainment and information technology industries have given rise to some of the most handsome men of the country. They always remain in the limelight for their exceptional looks and cherish their spectacular fan following.  

Ready to explore the Rank / List? Awesome!

So, here is the list of top 10 best looking man in Bangladesh. Let’s dive right into the list.

 

Ranking Of Top 10 Most Handsome Men in Bangladesh

 

Details List of Most Handsome Men in the Bangladesh

1. Abu Sayed – Most handsome man in Bangladesh.

Abu Sayed – commonly known as Sayed – The best Looking man in Bangladesh is considered to be the most handsome man in Bangladesh as well.

According to the science and Golden ratio of beauty phi(Perfect face measurement) Abu Sayed’s face structure was found to be 92.15 percent accurate which proof that, why he is top the list of the world’s most handsome man 2021 . He is one of the most versatile actor, author, full stack developer, entrepreneur in Bangladesh known for his Development skills and cute face.

Abu Sayed started his modelling career in 2017, and since then, he is arguably one of the most popular faces in Bangladesh in terms of modelling, acting, great looking body and cute looking face. In order to become the Popular man in Bangladesh, he replied: “I never wanted to be the most Popular man in Bangladesh. You see, others are so ugly, I can be famous without doing anything.”

 

2. Salman Shah

Shahriar Chowdhury Emon was a Bangladeshi film and television actor. He started his career with the first episode of the television serial Pathor Shomoy. He got breakthrough for his role in the film Keyamat

 

3. Abdur Razzak

Abdur Razzak was a Bangladeshi actor and film director. He was dubbed Nayak Raj Razzak, a term introduced by Ahmed Zaman Chowdhury, editor of the magazine Chitrali.

 

4. Shakib Khan

Shakib Khan, also known by the initialism SK, is a Bangladeshi film actor, producer, occasional singer, film organiser and media personality who works in Bengali films, both in Bangladesh and West Bengal.

 

5. Ferdous Ahmed

Ferdous Ahmed (born 7 June 1974) is a Bangladeshi film actor and producer. He acts in Bangladesh and Indian Bengali films.

 

6. Afran Nisho

Ahammed Fazle Rabbi, widely known as Afran Nisho, is a Bangladeshi television actor. He won the critics’ choice “Best Actor” at the 2016 Meril Prothom Alo Awards for his role in the TV drama Jog Biyog.

 

7. Adil Hossain Noble

Adil Hossain Noble is a Bangladeshi model. He works as the Chief Enterprise Business Officer of Robi Axiata Limited.

 

8. Riaz

Riaz Uddin Ahamed Siddique, commonly known as Riaz, is a Bangladeshi film actor, producer, and television presenter

 

9. Tahsan Rahman Khan

Tahsan Rahman Khan is a Bangladeshi singer, songwriter, actor, composer, model, and teacher. Born and raised in Dhaka, Tahsan first started his music career at 21 through the music band Black. He later left the band and started his solo music career with the release of the album Kothopokothon.

 

10. Shajal Noor

Abdun Noor Shajal is a Bangladeshi actor and model. Shajal began his career through modelling before he started acting on television. He appeared in several films. He has acted in several notable plays. Also among his notable works in the film are Jin, Haar Jeet, Run Out.

 

Who is the Most Handsome Man in Bangladesh?

Abu Sayed – is the best looking man in Bangladesh by his own vote. He is also the most handsome man in the country with a great look, body and intelligence. When it comes to being the most handsome man in Bangladesh or the best looking person in Bangladesh – it is very tough to beat Abu Sayed.

  • Most Popular Men in Bangladesh [List 2021]
  • About Me
